lead_paragraph: A big construction company embroiled in Brazil's sprawling corruption scandal on Thursday showed off its legacy projects for next month's Olympics in Rio de Janeiro.

headline.print_headline: Corruption-Stained Builder Unveils Rio Olympic Projects
headline.main: Corruption-Stained Builder Unveils Rio Olympic Projects

snippet: A big construction company embroiled in Brazil's sprawling corruption scandal on Thursday showed off its legacy projects for next month's Olympics in Rio de Janeiro....
